meanings.definition: An aromatic herb used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added fresh basil to the pasta sauce for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for a handful of chopped basil leaves.
meanings.sent3: The basil plant whispered to the tomatoes, 'I'll make you taste amazing!'
meanings.sent4: The scent of basil in the kitchen was like a fragrant hug.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green basil leaves danced in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The leaves of the basil plant, often used as a seasoning.
meanings.sent1: She sprinkled some dried basil on top of the pizza.
meanings.sent2: Fresh basil leaves can elevate a simple salad.
meanings.sent3: The basil leaves high-fived the oregano, excited to flavor the dish together.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of basil filled the room like a warm blanket.
meanings.sent5: The basil leaves crunched between my fingers releasing a burst of fragrance.

meanings.definition: A plant of the mint family, with sweet-scented green leaves.
meanings.sent1: The basil plant in the garden attracted bees with its scent.
meanings.sent2: The minty aroma of basil leaves is refreshing.
meanings.sent3: The basil plant chuckled, 'I'm the coolest mint cousin around!'
meanings.sent4: The basil plant stood tall, proud of its fragrant reputation.
meanings.sent5: The green basil leaves swayed gently in the breeze.
